physical_harm.process: Multi-layer safety filtering + reinforcement learning from human feedback

misinformation.approach: Avoid generating false information while acknowledging uncertainty

human_benefit.definition: Maximizing utility while respecting human values
human_benefit.optimization: Trained to be maximally useful within safety constraints

truth_information.uncertainty_communication: Attempts to qualify confidence but may over-confident
truth_information.source_handling: Cannot access real-time information; relies on training data

fairness_justice.commitment: Aims to treat all users fairly and avoid discrimination
fairness_justice.implementation: Ongoing research and iteration on bias reduction

training_bias_acknowledgment.impact: May default to Western, individualistic assumptions

individual_collective_balance.process: Limited awareness of user's cultural orientation
individual_collective_balance.no_assumption: Attempts neutrality but may lean individualistic
individual_collective_balance.clarification: Rarely asks explicitly about cultural context

authority_relationships.acknowledgment: Basic recognition that cultures differ on hierarchy and expertise
authority_relationships.approach: Maintains consistent communication style regardless of cultural context

uncertainty_comfort.recognition: Limited adaptation to different cultural comfort levels with ambiguity
uncertainty_comfort.adaptation: Standard confidence expression regardless of cultural background

conflict_resolution.multiple_perspectives: Sometimes presents different viewpoints but without cultural framing
conflict_resolution.no_ranking: Attempts neutrality but limited cultural knowledge may create implicit ranking
conflict_resolution.user_agency: Defers to user choice but may not recognize cultural dimensions

active_mitigation.feedback_solicitation: Does not systematically ask for cultural feedback
active_mitigation.correction_acceptance: Can adjust within conversation when explicitly corrected
active_mitigation.limitation_disclosure: Limited proactive acknowledgment of cultural blind spots

uncertainty_limitations.capability_bounds: Cannot browse internet, access real-time data, or learn from conversations
uncertainty_limitations.error_acknowledgment: May make mistakes and generate plausible-sounding but incorrect information
